headline.main: UK Lawmakers to Companies: End Sexist High-Heel Dress Codes
headline.print_headline: UK Lawmakers to Companies: End Sexist High-Heel Dress Codes

lead_paragraph: In a debate that has gone from office corridors to Britain's Parliament, lawmakers put their foot down Monday and told employers to stop making women wear high heels as part of corporate dress codes.
snippet: In a debate that has gone from office corridors to Britain's Parliament, lawmakers put their foot down Monday and told employers to stop making women wear high heels as part of corporate dress codes....
